front.title: Methods to convey FEC Framework Configuration Information

abstract.t: FEC Framework document [RFC6363] defines the FEC Framework Configuration Information necessary for the FEC framework operation. This document describes using existing signaling protocols such as Session Announcement Protocol (SAP), Session Initiation Protocol (SIP), Real Time Stream Protocol (RTSP) etc. to determine and dynamically communicate the Configuration information between sender(s) and receiver(s).
